EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1328802604.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1328802604.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Bernie,
Thank you for the follow up. Your information will stay in our system so whenever you are ready to move forward and use our services just let me know and we can start the contract process. Please let me know if you have any questions for me in the meantime.
Thank you and have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Bernie2 [mailto:btomasky@comcast.net] Sent: Wednesday, February 08, 2012 11:31 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up
I have worked for one firm that would only use me as a 1099 contractor. That said, the other role I was looking at with Infozen (you sent them paperwork), fell through when my primary contact left the company. I have started to look at permanent opportunities, hence the delay in billing services through you. I still may require your services at some point, since some of these roles could start in a consulting capacity. Thank you for following up with me, and hopefully I can stay in your system for the next 6 months or so as I work my way through things.
Bernie Tomasky
From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 08, 2012 10:33 AM To: btomasky@comcast.net Subject: MBO Partners Follow Up
Dear Bernie,
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding MBO Partners. I know you had expressed interest in using our services. Any update would be great and I look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
Nicolette
Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
